name: Organic Coffee Powder

name: Organic Ragi Hurihittu
description: Experience the wholesome goodness of our Organic Ragi Huri Hittu, a versatile and nutritious flour made from sprouted and roasted finger millet. Also known as Ragi Hittu, this flour is  rich in essential nutrients and offers numerous health benefits.

name: Organic Special Ragi Malt
description: Explore the wholesome goodness of our Special Ragi Malt, a premium blend crafted from 100% pure ragi for a nutritious boost. Our ragi malt powder is made from carefully processed ragi grains, offering a rich source of essential nutrients and energy.

name: Organic Millet Badam Milk - Instant Drink
description: Millet Badam Milk is a delicious and nutritious beverage that combines the wholesome goodness of millet with the rich flavor of almonds. Made from finely ground millet grains.

name: Organic Ragi Malt
description: Ragi Malt, also known as Ragi Satva, Ragi Java, or Ragi Porridge, is a nutritious and versatile beverage made from finely ground finger millet. Renowned for its rich, earthy flavor and numerous health benefits, this ragi malt powder is a popular choice for a wholesome breakfast or snack.
